valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Fri 26 Dec 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Sat 27 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Low FitzRoy 1008 and high Cromarty 1037, losing their identities. New low Trafalgar 1005 by 0600 tomorrow
